Package mtas.analysis.util

Class MtasTokenizerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.AbstractAnalysisFactory
      • org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.TokenizerFactory
        • mtas.analysis.util.MtasTokenizerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware
    public class MtasTokenizerFactory
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.TokenizerFactory
implements org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware
    A factory for creating MtasTokenizer objects.
